aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
content: Hi! I’m passionate about technology and work as a Web Developer since 2016. I always reading news in the programming world and keep a few personal projects.
I'm from Rio de Janeiro - Brazil and moved to Sao Paulo on July 2019 to work.

list.title: Desenvolvedor Front End
list.description: On the first project I worked on a e-commerce using VTEX, angular 7 and 8, Vuejs and sass. On the second project I am currently working with React Native.

list.title: Desenvolvedor Full Stack
list.description: Built websites with Wordpress and managed servers.

list.title: Desenvolvedor Full Stack
list.description: Built websites with wordpress and Laravel, Built an app with React Native and managed servers.
